text: Mamta Wahab is a Jatiya Party (Ershad) politician and the former Member of Parliament of Mymensingh-4. She is the older sister of Rowshan Ershad and was arrested on 14 December 1991 after her brother was removed from power. ==Career== Wahab was elected to parliament from Mymensingh-4 as a Jatiya Party candidate in 1988. She served as the Deputy Minister of Health. Her sister, Rowshan Ershad, her brother-in-law, Hussain Mohammad Ershad, was the President of Bangladesh. ==References== Category:Jatiya Party politicians Category:2012 deaths Category:4th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Government ministers of Bangladesh Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Mamta Wahab
